remarks: The direct product splits into the direct product of any partition of the index set.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)
statement:
dprdsplit.2 $e |- ( ph -> S : I --> ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
dprdsplit.i $e |- ( ph -> ( C i^i D ) = (/) ) $.
dprdsplit.u $e |- ( ph -> I = ( C u. D ) ) $.
dmdprdsplit.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
dmdprdsplit.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
dmdprdsplit2.1 $e |- ( ph -> G dom DProd ( S |` C ) ) $.
dmdprdsplit2.2 $e |- ( ph -> G dom DProd ( S |` D ) ) $.
dmdprdsplit2.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( G DProd ( S |` C ) ) C_ ( Z ` ( G DProd ( S |` D ) ) ) ) $.
dmdprdsplit2.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( G DProd ( S |` C ) ) i^i ( G DProd ( S |` D ) ) ) = { .0. } ) $.
dmdprdsplit2 $p |- ( ph -> G dom DProd S ) $.
